comment:
Based on the feedback provided by your colleagues, it seems that the code you have written to solve the optimization problem is well-structured and follows best practices. The variables, constraints, and objective function have been correctly identified and implemented using the Gurobi optimization library.

One suggestion for improvement would be to include more detailed comments within the code to explain the purpose of each section or step. This can help improve the readability and maintainability of the code for future reference.

Additionally, you may consider adding a step-by-step explanation of how the optimization problem is being solved using the Gurobi library. This can help readers understand the process and logic behind the code implementation.

Overall, your code is on the right track and effectively addresses the optimization problem presented in the scenario. Keep up the good work!
